xwikidoc.title: ProposalTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields ProposalCode.ProposalClass_name=Name ProposalCode.ProposalClass_type=Type ProposalCode.ProposalClass_type_t3=Implementation ProposalCode.ProposalClass_type_t2=Design ProposalCode.ProposalClass_type_t1=Requirements ProposalCode.ProposalClass_type_t4=Feature ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status=Status ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status_s2=Active ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status_s1=Idea ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status_s5=Dropped ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status_s3=Dormant ProposalCode.ProposalClass_status_s4=Completed ProposalCode.ProposalClass_participants=Participants ProposalCode.ProposalClass_issues=Issues ProposalCode.ProposalClass_mails=Mails ProposalCode.ProposalClass_other=Other URLs ProposalCode.ProposalClass_description=Description
# Add proposal proposal.proposalAdd.heading=Add proposal proposal.proposalAdd.label=Proposal name … proposal.proposalAdd.submit=Add
# Edit proposal proposal.proposalEdit.name.hint=Name of the proposal proposal.proposalEdit.type.hint=Type or phase of the proposal proposal.proposalEdit.status.hint=Status of the proposal proposal.proposalEdit.participants.hint=List of participants involved in defining/designing/implementing the proposal proposal.proposalEdit.issues.hint=List of issues related to the proposal proposal.proposalEdit.mails.hint=List of discussions held about the proposal's topic proposal.proposalEdit.other.hint=List of other links relevant to the proposal's topic proposal.proposalEdit.description.hint=Details about the proposal
# List proposals proposal.proposalList.heading=Available proposals
# List proposals children proposal.proposalListChildren.heading=Related proposals
# Livetable generic keys proposal.livetable.doc.creationDate=Created proposal.livetable.doc.date=Last modified proposal.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Livetable specific keys proposal.livetable.name=Name proposal.livetable.type=Type proposal.livetable.status=Status proposal.livetable.participants=Participants proposal.livetable.issues=Jiras proposal.livetable.mails=Mails proposal.livetable.other=Other URLs proposal.livetable.description=Description
